entry.title: About Me
entry.summary:
Welcome to my blog! I am a final year undergraduate at University of Oxford studying mostly economics, but really just spending loads of time on Cousera.org and similar awesome MOOC sites (I mean, I have to love them, I already finished 12 courses...) playing with machine learning, data science, statistics, computer science and all the things awesome.

I love to hack data and I worked in a data science position for a half a year at Pearson Plc, but I also have full-time like experience from international consultancies and NGOs.

If you want to, feel free to get in touch at james [dot] langr [at] gmail [dot] com or via the LinkedIn profile in links!
